b.span: Later, in the Inventory apps, the worker uses the list of orders to deliver in the "Delivery Orders" section.

ul.li: From the website go to the top menu "Contact Us".
This customized form will create an opportunity in the CRM, with the right information.

template.p: From the CRM, schedule a meeting. As you meet the client, you can create a quotation and use the product catalog. to easily present products to the client and record his order.
To create a quotation, select the template "CCTV Installation Setup". That fills in two products:

ul.li: CCTV Camera: 1 Unit
Installation Service: 1 Unit

template.p: As the customer confirms the sales order, one task will be created in the 'Installation Service'.
You can deliver the 1 product ("CCTV Camera") from the inventory application. Use the barcode scanner, or the backend, up to you.
Warranty days for above product will be calculated at the date of delivery, based on the warranty period defined on the product.
Assign the field service engineer on the task of "Installation Service".

After the planning, field service engineer will visit the client place and start working on installation, they move the task "In Progress" and then "Done" when it's finished and sign the service report.
If the product is in warranty and customer has any complaint, we can repair the product and generate the invoice when relevant.

ul.li: Go to website and Helpdesk form
In the form, the customer describes the product ('ThinkPad X1 Carbon 35.56cms - 12th Gen Intel i7'), the serial number('CNC012345'), and submit the ticket.
Open the Helpdesk App, and then click the Tickets button to find the list of tickets, newest one is yours.

template.p: You can iterate with customers to define the best way to proceed to satisfy them from the chatter.
In case you decide that the product needs a return and repair, then you need to proceed as follow:

ul.li: From the ticket, click the Return button and adjust the quantities for the corresponding product and click return.

div.p:
The customer may not have been delivered any device yet and returns are only supported after deliveries.
To follow the flow, change the Customer to your contact.

ul.li: The transfer can be validated, as if you were receiving the product from the customer.
Come back to the Helpdesk ticket using the breadcrumb and note the return in the smart buttons.
Now click the Repair button to create a repair order.
Select the appropriate return and product, and adjust if needed the serial number.
Place some notes if relevant and confirm the repair order.
When working on it, click the Start Repair, and then End Repair when finished fixing the product.

template.blockquote: If the product is under warranty then no need to create the invoice and if the product is out of warranty then the user can send the quotation for the repair. Once the customer confirms the rate then the user can start repairing and after the repair, we will give the customer an invoice.
